page.title: 18ACTIVITIES AND ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The Market Hall and the new Botley Centre (opened in 1982) hold most of the activities in Botley.They have playgroups in the mornings and ante_natal clinics most afternoons.In the evenings there are discos,keep_fit and dancing classes,badminton and table tennis.The scouts use the Botley Centre.There are cricket and football teams.The local pubs have live music, particularly jazz groups and the British Legion have a social club. For teenagers between 14 and 17 there is little entertainment besides a youth club and most go into the towns. The Botley Carnival was held this year for the first time in 15 years.It lasted for a week and was a great success.
